title: Purple Axiom Contract Registry
description: Authoritative registry mapping contract ids to schema files and artifact globs to contracts. This file is repo-static and MUST NOT include volatile or timestamped data.

registry_version.description: Registry schema/content version (SemVer). Bump when the registry meaningfully changes.

contracts.description: Contract definitions. Deterministic ordering requirement (enforced outside JSON Schema): sort ascending by contract_id (UTF-8 byte order).

bindings.description: Artifact glob bindings. Deterministic ordering requirement (enforced outside JSON Schema): sort ascending by (artifact_glob, contract_id) (UTF-8 byte order).

notes.description: Optional human-readable notes. Notes MUST be redaction-safe and stable (avoid volatile data).

contract_id.description: Stable identifier for a contract. Intended to be filename-derived (without .schema.json).

schema_path.description: Repository-relative path to the schema file. MUST be local and under docs/contracts/.

artifact_glob.description: Run-bundle-relative artifact glob (POSIX separators). MUST NOT start with '/' and MUST NOT include 'runs/<run_id>/' prefix.

contract_version.description: Declared contract version. MUST equal the schema's contract_version const (enforced by validator/runtime).

purpose.description: Optional short purpose string for humans.

artifact_kind.description: Optional classification to help tooling decide when and how to validate.

validation_mode.description: Optional hint for validators. If omitted, validators infer from contract/extension and stage rules.

notes.description: Optional redaction-safe notes. MUST be stable and MUST avoid volatile data.
